short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Separates 2FA from password in E*trade log-in form, saving confusion and password-manager damage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: E*trade does 2FA badly. This makes one of E*trade's impediments less bad by splitting the 2FA code from the password in log-in forms.
